refnamediv.refpurpose: Get size of shared memory block

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: shmop_size is used to get the size, in bytes of the shared memory block.
shmop_size takes the shmid, which is the shared memory block identifier created by shmop_open, the function will return and int, which represents the number of bytes the shared memory block occupies.

example.title: Getting the size of the shared memory block

refsect1.para: This example will put the size of shared memory block identified by $shm_id into $shm_size.
